thread.title: South Africa today

author: news24.com
title: South Africa today
text:
In 1994 i voted for change in South Africa and thought that our situation will improve locally and internationally. I was positive and full of hope for the future.Over the last fiew years i had to keep my self positive and continued to hope for a better future for all of us .Being a daily reader of news 24 i am now very concerned regarding the local situation.
One can not open any news paper or online news site without seen absolute lawlessnes taking place all over RSA.People are being shot at major shopping centres People are being murdered on a daily basis .Houses are being broken in to on a daily basis.Harmless females are being accosted in their subburbs and on motor ways.farmers are being attacked in teir homes ,tortured and killed for a cellphone.cars and live stock are being stolen on a daily basis.!Corruption is rife and i dont have to elaborate as enough is said in the media.Our Politicians are seen as incompetent and below standard internationally.If one projects tis deterioration for the next 15 years i ame unable to think that my grand children wil live in a civilised country..!Dear mr Editor of this news site have you got any suggestions or strategy to stop the demise of our country .Is it not time to engage Governmet with a collective thrust from all news agency's and stand together to stop this carnage..I am willing to help and am currently involved with my local municipality to help improve service levels and administration.i look fforward to hear from you.Sincerely Daan Venter
